ai-tha-ap250:1.2_0: I made friends with my head,
ai-tha-ap250:1.3_0: I bowed down to the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap250:2.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap250:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap250:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap250:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcasikha.
ai-tha-ap250:5.1_0: Eight senior monks are advancing, a senior by flowers, and eight parts.
